channel.title: Server Wont Host Online (Look)
channel.description: Ive portforwarded correctly like i always did ... i have no anti virus... router is set to dmz on the host's ip .. ive hosted private servers b4 same steps i followed this time no servers host? i have no firewall / antivurs?? Im running Windows 7

item.title: Server Wont Host Online (Look)
item.dc:creator: @we_rushed_god we rushed god
item.description:
@we_rushed_god wrote:

ok so most people don’t know is that you have to set up a static ip adress. visit portforwarding.com and find the router u have, then in that link it will tell you how to portforward and it will tell u how to set up a static ip adress. very simple once you read it a couple times hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: Server Wont Host Online (Look)
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“unh0ly, post:7, topic:396858”]check your Firewall, could be blocking access to port 43594, (assuming that’s the port your on)
Or, Use the Utorrent method, Try searching around some sites. Many others have had the same problem you do,
And there might be a different solution.
Hope i helped. somewhat :s[/quote]
He said he has no firewall

Read full topic

item.title: Server Wont Host Online (Look)

item.description:
@system wrote:

check your Firewall, could be blocking access to port 43594, (assuming that’s the port your on)
Or, Use the Utorrent method, Try searching around some sites. Many others have had the same problem you do,
And there might be a different solution.
Hope i helped. somewhat :s
